comments.body:
Thanks for raising this ticket.

In order for me to escalate it to the core team, all the fields must be complete. Please check it against the [JIRA Ticket Checklist|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-JIRATicketChecklist], and add any missing information.  For the description, you can use [this template|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/JIRA+Ticket+Template] as a starting point.

Furthermore, a use case must be included, so that we can see exactly how you envisage the feature would work.

Cheers
Closing ticket due to the time passed, lack of information and lack of progress. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
